pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to Average Purchase Price of Vehicles in Brazil // The Brazilian vehicle purchase pricing table is provided by the Institute of Economic Research Foundation (Fipe) and used in purchase negotiations according to region, vehicles conservation, color, accessories or any other factor that might influence the demand and supply for a specific vehicle. For more on the data themselves and web access, please see https://www.fipe.org.br/en-us/home/.
